title: Towards a scalable AI-driven framework for data-independent Cyber Threat Intelligence Information Extraction
summary: Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) is critical for mitigating threats to organizations, governments, and institutions, yet the necessary data are often dispersed across diverse formats. AI-driven solutions for CTI Information Extraction (IE) typically depend on high-quality, annotated data, which are not always available.
